document.full_text: bayreuth university said friday that the former german defense minister, karl-theodor zu guttenberg, 'deliberately' plagiarized parts of his doctoral thesis.
document.title: europe: germany: ex-minister's plagiarism was deliberate, university says
lines_and_colors: bayreuth university said friday that the former german defense minister, karl-theodor zu guttenberg, 'deliberately' plagiarized parts of his doctoral thesis.
